long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NOTE/DISCLAIMER!!!: It is possible that Blackbaud will take the old portal offline and this extension will break but all you have to do in that case is to either use the extension's brand new settings menu to disable the features or disable the entire extension or completely delete it.

This extension has an options menu when you click on its icon in the extensions quick menu that will allow you to customize or change in real-time whether you would like to use the new or old portal. In addition, you can choose between using only the old assignment center, only the old assignment detail, both, or none. 

When enabled, the extension will enable you to use the old version of the assignment center or/and the assignment detail.

(For Trevor Day School)
